column5: I rear ended a car this morning... I knew it was going to be a REALLY bad day. The driver got out of the other car, and he was a DWARF! He looked up at me and said, "I am NOT happy". I said, "Well, which one ARE you then?" That's when the fight started!!!  HH
Roy was in Toronto?  And he fought you just for that?
LOL...great one...how are your kneecaps and shins??? hehe.
that's joke has been around for a while and I love it and stole it and used it as my own a few times
Yeah, it gets a lot of air time but it's still funny.  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...24&hl=dwarf
I wonder where it came from?
Pretty sure it came from Alabananas.
Unhappy the Dwarf.  I never heard of that one.  Did he have a princess with him?
